text: "U Can't Touch This" is a song by MC Hammer. It is from his 1990 album Please Hammer, Don't Hurt 'Em. It was released on January 13, 1990. This song is considered to be his signature song. It is one of his most popular songs. ==References== ==Other websites== * "U Can't Touch This" music video * [ U Can't Touch This] at Allmusic Category:1990 songs Category:Rap music Category:MC Hammer songs
title: U Can't Touch This
